comment: If ` F ` is a monomorphism and ` G ` is a section of ` F ` , then ` G ` is an inverse of ` F ` and they are both isomorphisms. This is also stated as "a monomorphism which is also a split epimorphism is an isomorphism". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
